root.name: Jumpjet
root.description: OverviewIn Jumpjet, players control a jet plane armed with unlimited missiles. Using the cursor keys, players control the plane's altitude and direction of flight through a side-scrolling landscape swarming with enemies such as tanks, jet fighters and bombers.Technical informationJumpjet was released for PC and allows the following display modes:4-colour CGA16-colour EGA, low resolution16-colour EGA, high resolutionThe game supports the AdLib or compatible sound board.LicenceJumpjet is user-support software, where players are encourage to share the game with others. The author requests that players register the software (with a payment of $15) in order to receive an updated version of the game and a printed owner's manual.
